name: engageable-nestjs
description: An engagement library/plugin for adding engagement (likes, comments, reposts, bookmarks, etc.) to entities in a NestJS application.
author: Engr. Isaiah Pius E. <isaiahtech1@gmail.com>

scripts.link:local: npm run copy:dist && cd ../build/engageable-nestjs && npm link
scripts.copy:dist: npm run build && rm -rf ../build/engageable-nestjs && mkdir -p ../build/engageable-nestjs && cp -r dist package.json README.md ../build/engageable-nestjs/
scripts.update:app: echo 'Syncing build...' && rm -rf ../../web/OgaVerify/apps/backend/node_modules/engageable-nestjs && mkdir -p ../../web/OgaVerify/apps/backend/node_modules/engageable-nestjs && cp -r ../build/engageable-nestjs/* ../../web/OgaVerify/apps/backend/node_modules/engageable-nestjs/ && echo 'âœ… Sync complete.'
scripts.watch:build:copy: nodemon --watch src --ext ts --exec "npm run copy:dist && npm run update:app"
